input.sentences: the table was set for a nice family dinner .
josh 's family sat around reading as they waited for the food to be served .
the family put down their books to talk for a while .
josh was busy drinking and cooking in the kitchen .
his girlfriend joined in to assist with making dinner .
output.sentences: We set up the table very nicely.
We waited there until we were served.
While we were waiting we were talking about recent books we had read.
Josh, an aspiring chef, decided to cook a beautiful meal for us.
He also invited his girlfriend to the party!
